sentence.value: Claude Nicollier (born 2 September 1944 in Vevey, Switzerland) is the first astronaut from Switzerland, and has flown on four Space Shuttle missions.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Claude Nicollier|Claude_Nicollier]] (born 2 [[September 1944|1944]] in [[Vevey , Switzerland|Vevey_-_Switzerland]] is [[the first astronaut|Astronaut]] from [[Switzerland|Switzerland]], and has flown on [[four Space|Space]] [[Shuttle missions|List_of_space_shuttle_missions]].
